where i live is a busy bus route, and parking is very difficult.
i would like councils to make grass verges into hardcore surfaces.
this will help drivers and pedestrians, because we have had several near miss with cars having to mount the paths to clear oncoming cars.
and the grass verges are just mud holes this time of year,this will help my communities, and more if the problem was looked at all over.
i have spoken to my local council,and was given no answer just excuses. they may do sometime if some one is run over but that will be to late for them.

rejection.details: This is a matter for local highway authorities.
